mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OPEN_CHAT_MEMBER (OPEN_CHAT_MEMBER_SEQ, OPEN_CHAT_SEQ, RESIDENT_SEQ, OPEN_CHAT_MEMBER_PRTCPT_DT, STATUS) VALUES (OPEN_CHAT_MEMBER_SEQ.nextval, #{openChatSeq}, #{residentSeq}, sysdate, 'Y')
mapper.update: update OPEN_CHAT_MEMBER set status = 'N' WHERE OPEN_CHAT_SEQ = #{openChatSeq} AND RESIDENT_SEQ = #{residentSeq}
update OPEN_CHAT_MEMBER set status = 'Y' WHERE OPEN_CHAT_SEQ = #{openChatSeq} AND RESIDENT_SEQ = #{residentSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT RESIDENT_ID FROM OPEN_CHAT_MEMBER OCM JOIN RESIDENT R ON(OCM.RESIDENT_SEQ = R.RESIDENT_SEQ) WHERE OPEN_CHAT_SEQ = #{openChatSeq} AND OCM.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY RESIDENT_ID ASC
